headline: Ralph Lauren, IBD Stock Of The Day, Rebounds After Fears Of Slower Sales Growth
summary: Ralph Lauren's stock is approaching a new buy point after slipping slightly following an earnings report, earlier this month, in which its sales growth slowed compared to previous quarters.

headline: Why is Ralph Lauren (RL) One of the Best Luxury Stocks to Buy Now?
summary: Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL) is one of the best luxury stocks to buy now. Telsey Advisory reaffirmed a Buy rating on Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL) on February 10, setting a price target of $435. The rating update came after the company reported strong fiscal Q3 2026 holiday results on February 5, exceeding expectations. Fiscal Q3 […]

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Ralph Lauren (RL) After Its Strong Multi Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Ralph Lauren is still fairly priced after a strong run, this article will walk you through how its current share price lines up with different ways of thinking about value. The stock recently closed at US$378.08, with returns of 5.2% over 7 days, 4.1% over 30 days, 4.3% year to date, and 33.7% over 1 year, plus very large gains over 3 and 5 years that may have changed how investors view its risk and reward profile. Recent coverage around Ralph Lauren has focused...
